Package model

Class SteelBrickModel

java.lang.Object
controller.BrickController
model.SteelBrickModel
public class SteelBrickModel
extends BrickController
SteelBrickModel Class extends BrickControllerClass, creates the implementation of the SteelBrickModel. Responsible for defining colours and strength.
